ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.io.util

Class HostBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.io.util.HostBridge

  • public class HostBridge
extends Object
    Provides static methods that can be used to create connections between the hosts files and the virtual disk. To move the data a DefaultMover is used. This can be used to e.g. compress the data.

      • importFile

        public static void importFile(File hostFile,
              VDiskFile virtualFile,
              DataMover mover)
                       throws IOException
        Imports the given host File (may be a file or directory) into the given VDiskFile. The parent of virtualFile has to exists otherwise an UnsupportedOperationException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        hostFile - what to import
        virtualFile - where to import into
        mover - a moving strategy
        Throws:
        IOException - TODO

                       throws IOException
        Exports the given VDiskFile (may be a file or directory) into the given File on the host system.
        Parameters:
        virtualFile - what to export
        hostFile - where to export to
        mover - a moving strategy
